cells.data: -- writeFile :: FilePath -> String -> IO ()on writeFile(strPath, strText)	set ca to current application	(ca's NSString's stringWithString:strText)'s ¬		writeToFile:(stringByStandardizingPath of ¬			(ca's NSString's stringWithString:strPath)) atomically:true ¬			encoding:(ca's NSUTF8StringEncoding) |error|:(missing value)end writeFile
